name: Let it Out (Demo)
description:
THIS IS THE DEMO THE GAME WILL BE UPDATED TO HAVE MORE LEVELS!

 A green square goes on a adventure to get a potion to let out his anger his friend bob (blue square) helps him make his way to the potion.

Websites the game is on:
